attributes.title: the worst app i have ever downloaded
attributes.review: this app gives me the urge to run into a wall and never stop... he says all lives matter but obviously not if i’m going to die from running into a wall🤡.. there’s a lot of bugs in the system of privacy.. it kept saying “white power” which i thought was super derogatory bc “he’s not racist” so it’s misleading.. 0/10 recommend downloading this app unless you would want to be mislead and misinformed.. also you’ll get dragged on twitter if you actually support this cheeto so watch out chile 💅🏼💅🏼

attributes.title: This app killed my family
attributes.review: Idk how but while this app was downloading my phone jumped out of my hands and stabbed 🔪🔪🔪 everyone in my house while my phone was screaming “TRUMP 2020🇺🇸” now all I have left is my dead family and tiktok but I guess it’s gonna get banned so I actually have nothing left😔

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: this app is horrible, they stole my money! I tried to do something and they completely blew me off and just kept the money and when you first open the app a disgusting image shows up, I almost threw up it was so nasty omg 🤮 even thinking about it makes me wanna hurl

attributes.title: terrible app🤢
attributes.review: i just cannot with this app any longer it has made me sick. to think a CHEETO with a TUPAY is what this app was made for is horrifying to me. we as a country cannot stand this. for this reason i live this treacherous app with one star and i ask u all do the same. thank you for coming to my ted talk.

attributes.title: This ain’t it.
attributes.review: I mean tell me why you would support him. He is a disgusting pig. If you support him you’re a pig too.🐷 And not those cute pigs those ugly pigs that everyone hates. I hope this was helpful I would never use it just wanted to rate it because he is disgusting, racist, and sexist! PERIOD  Hope this gets taken off!🧚💖✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I saw a Cheeto on the screen and I screamed! I am deathly allergic to cheese and seeing this made me barf. People like this exist you know😿. I would make it 0 STARS if I could. I’m in the hospital right now because I started dying. Hope I don’t get corona ✌️😛 This app almost killed me so I hope that y’all stay safe from this Cheeto Puff😿😿😿

This app is disgusting once I opened it all I saw was a naked orange man it was so bad I am soon to be going to therapy from the trama this left it also makes my phone glitch so bad and this app is just horrible they shouldn’t have these type of things for the public what is wrong with these ppl

attributes.title: This is terrifying
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a gorilla that was orange 🍊 I was terrified it made me want to throw up🤢🤮and I think I will have nightmares I then wondered why a orange gorilla would have a wig on 🧐but I also wonder why this disturbing app takes up so much space I do not recommend downloading it it was disgusting and terrifying

attributes.title: HORRIBLE 🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: this app made my chicken die! i left my chicken sitting on my bed with my phone and this app was open, my chicken DIED because it saw a cheeto on the screen and tried to eat it but ate my phone instead 👁💧👄💧👁. i know that because it told me! it became a chicken ghost and told me in person! please don’t download this app. CHICKEN LIVES MATTER!!!😼😻😹❤️✨

attributes.title: would never use AGAIN!!!!!!
attributes.review: Just awful and disappointing. With all the apps I have downloaded on my phone this is by far the worst one I have experienced! Absolutely terrible and would definitely never use or recommend to anyone!
